description.plain:
Sofia Karlberg became famous when she made a cover of Beyoncé’s music “Crazy in Love” . His resurgence was in the top 55 of the UK Singles Chart , Hot 40 UK, for several weeks on Spotify and in the top of iTunes in several countries  . She also other popular times such as “Take Me to Church of Hozier” , which was incorporated into the trailer for the third season of the series Empire  , “Stay with Me” Sam Smith  and “Shamelessfrom” The Weeknd.
Swedish singer and songwriter who has earned over 2.1 million subscribers and more than 338 million views on YouTube and had released several covers on iTunes, including “Take Me to Church,” “Cool Kids,” and “Love Me Harder.”
She grew up in Stockholm, Sweden, in a family of both Swedish and Moroccan heritage.

She also other popular times such as “Take Me to Church of Hozier” , which was incorporated into the trailer for the third season of the series Empire  , “Stay with Me” Sam Smith  and “Shamelessfrom” The Weeknd.

songs.full_title: Crazy In Love by Sofia Karlberg
songs.title: Crazy In Love

description.plain: ‘Crazy In Love’, an R&B-pop (-turned- ballad for the 2015 American erotic drama film 50 Shades of Grey) song originally by Beyonce, was covered by Youtuber Sofia Karlberg. This cover of hers has earned over 56 million views and a live performance at the Swedish Youtube Awards in 2015.

songs.embed_content: Read “Crazy In Love” by Sofia Karlberg on Genius

body.plain: ‘Crazy In Love’, an R&B-pop (-turned- ballad for the 2015 American erotic drama film 50 Shades of Grey) song originally by Beyonce, was covered by Youtuber Sofia Karlberg. This cover of hers has earned over 56 million views and a live performance at the Swedish Youtube Awards in 2015.

songs.lyrics:
10 ContributorsCrazy In Love Lyrics[Verse 1]
I look and stare so deep in your eyes
I touch on you more and more every time
When you leave I'm begging you not to go
Call your name two, three times in a row
Such a funny thing for me to try to explain
How I'm feeling and my pride is the one to blame, yeah
'Cause I know I don't understand
Just how your love can do what no one else can

[Hook]
Got me looking so crazy right now
Your love's got me looking so crazy right now
Got me looking so crazy right now
Your touch got me looking so crazy right now
Got me looking so crazy right now
Got me hoping you'll page me right now
Your kiss got me hoping you'll save me right now
Looking so crazy in love's
Got me looking, got me looking so crazy in love

[Verse 2]
When I talk to my friends so quietly
(Who he think he is?) Look at what you've done to me
Tennis shoes, don't even need to buy a new dress
If you ain't here; ain't nobody else to impress
It's way that you know what I thought I knew
It's the beat my heart skips when I'm with you
But I still don't understand
Just how your love can do what no one else can
You might also like[Hook]
Got me looking so crazy right now
Your love's got me looking so crazy right now
Got me looking so crazy right now
Your touch got me looking so crazy right now
Got me looking so crazy right now
Got me hoping you'll page me right now
Your kiss got me hoping you'll save me right now
Looking so crazy in love's
Got me looking, got me looking so crazy in love

Got me looking so crazy right now
Your love's got me looking so crazy right now
Got me looking so crazy right now
Your touch got me looking so crazy right now
Got me looking so crazy right now
Got me hoping you'll page me right now
Your kiss got me hoping you'll save me right now
Looking so crazy in love's
Got me looking, got me looking so crazy in love

[Outro]
Oh-oh, oh-oh, oh-oh, oh no no...2Embed

songs.title: Rockstar
songs.embed_content: Read “Rockstar” by Sofia Karlberg on Genius
songs.lyrics:
7 ContributorsRockstar Lyrics[Chorus]
I've been fuckin' hoes and poppin' pillies
Man, I feel just like a rockstar (star)
All my brothers got that gas
And they always be smokin' like a Rasta
Fuckin' with me, call up on a Uzi
And show up, now them the shottas
When my homies pull up on your block
They make that thing go rrra-ta-tap-ta

[Verse 1]
Switch my whip, came back in black
I'm startin' sayin', "Rest in peace to Bon Scott" (Scott)
Close that door, we blowin' smoke
She ask me light a fire like I'm Morrison
Act a fool on stage
I prolly leave my fuckin' show in a cop car (car)
Shit was legendary
Threw a TV out the window of the Montage
Cocaine on the table, liquor pourin', don't give a damn
Dude, your girlfriend is a groupie, she just tryna get in
Sayin', "I'm with the band"
Now she actin' outta pocket
Tryna grab up from my pants
Hundred bitches in my trailer say they ain't got a man
And they all brought a friend
You might also like[Chorus]
Oh, I've been fuckin' hoes and poppin' pillies
Man, I feel just like a rockstar (star)
All my brothers got that gas
And they always be smokin' like a Rasta
Fuckin' with me, call up on a Uzi
And show up, now them the shottas
When my homies pull up on your block
They make that thing go rrra-ta-tap-ta

[Verse 2]
I've been in the Hills fuckin' superstars
Feelin' like a pop star (star)
Drankin' Henny, bad bitches jumpin' in the pool
And they ain't got on no bra (bra)
Hit her from the back, pullin' on her tracks
And now she screamin' out, "no more" (more)
They like, "Savage, why you got a 12 car garage
When you only got 6 cars?"
I ain't with the cakin', how you kiss that?
Your wifey say I'm lookin' like a whole snack
Green hundreds in my safe, I got old racks
L.A. bitches always askin' where the coke at
Livin' like a rockstar, smash out on a cop car
Sweeter than a Pop-Tart, you know you are not hard
I done made the hot chart, 'member I used to trap hard
Livin' like a rockstar, I'm livin' like a rockstar
[Chorus]
Oh, I've been fuckin' hoes and poppin' pillies
Man, I feel just like a rockstar (star)
Oh all my brothers got that gas
And they always be smokin' like a Rasta
Fuckin' with me, call up on a Uzi
And show up, now with them shottas
When my homies pull up on your block
They make that thing go rrra-ta-tap-ta2Embed

songs.title: Stockholm Syndrome
songs.embed_content: Read “Stockholm Syndrome” by Sofia Karlberg on Genius
songs.lyrics:
5 ContributorsStockholm Syndrome Lyrics[Chorus]
Losing track of time, lose our minds
Got me homeward bound
My hands, can't get out, I’m tied
Hostage of your eyes
Oh, I'm so tired, but I take your side
You know love is blind, oh, help me I
I'm affected by Stockholm Syndrome

[Verse 1]
Won’t you ever let me feel the open sky?
Memories wherever I go by
You can be so quiet
You can be so cold sometimes
Always so deceiving, misreading all the signs
But I'm never leaving, leaving you behind
You know you're so pretty
Oh, make me fall in love

[Chorus]
Losing track of time, lose our minds
Got me homeward bound
My hands, can't get out, I'm tied
Hostage of your eyes
Oh, I'm so tired, but I take your side
You know love is blind, oh, help me I
I'm affected by Stockholm Syndrome
You might also like[Verse 2]
Can't you see that we’re about to lose our minds?
All your cheap thrills almost make us feel alive
You can be so violent (You can be so violent)
You can be so cruel sometimes
Broken hearts ain’t never hard to find
Seasons change like this is paradise
You're so beautiful sometimes

[Chorus]
Losing track of time, lose our minds
Got me homeward bound
My hands, can’t get out, I'm tied
Hostage of your eyes
Oh, I'm so tired, but I take your side
You know love is blind, oh, help me I
I'm affected by Stockholm Syndrome

[Bridge]
Queen of ice when lying in your winter coat
The summer brings its gold
And makes your water glow
Keep on trying to escape my restless soul
Won’t leave me alone
Oh, please take me home
[Chorus]
Losing track of time, lose our minds
Got me homeward bound
My hands, can't get out, I'm tied
Hostage of your eyes
Oh, I'm so tired, but I take your side
You know love is blind, oh, help me I
I'm affected by Stockholm Syndrome

[Outro]
Stockholm Syndrome
Stockholm Syndrome1Embed
